div.span: Hope Academy, a public charter school, was founded in 1998 by Bishop Andrew Merritt, Pastor of the Straight Gate International Church on the tenants of academic excellence, student responsibility and parental partnership. With these tenants, our goal is that every child will be equipped to be productive within their communities. Hope Academy has a healthy academic environment in which all children can learn. We pride ourselves on providing every child the opportunity to explore and develop to their fullest potential. Beyond academic excellence, our success is founded upon treating each child with the highest of priority.

ul.li: Students will be permitted to enter the building at 7:50 a.m.
Classes will begin promptly at 8:00 a.m.
Classes will be dismissed promptly at 3:30 p.m.
Parents/Guardians must pick up their students no later than 3:35 p.m.
Kindergarten students are dismissed at 3:15 p.m.
Due to safety and security concerns, students may not go to the cars without an adult.
No students are allowed to leave the building without an escort, unless they walk or ride the bus.
Parental permission is required for all students who walk. A signed note must be on file in the office.
